section.name: Deprecated Spice Components
section.p: Several Spice components have reached the end of their lifecycle. This page documents the deprecated components.

subsection.name: ClassMan
subsection.p: The ClassMan component was migrated to the Loom project as that is the only consumer of the component.

subsection.name: CLI
subsection.p:
The CLI component has been deprecated in favour the more actively developed in favour of the more actively maintained Jakarta Commons CLI project. The source and binary is still accessible via a website at
http://www.realityforge.org/java/cli/ .

subsection.name: Extension
subsection.p: The Extension component was migrated to the Loom project as that is the only consumer of the component.

subsection.name: XML Policy
subsection.p: The XML Policy component was migrated to the Loom project as that is the only consumer of the component.
